page.title: 05PENDRAGON HOTEL SOUTHSEA
page.content: One of the largest hotels in Southsea is the{Pendragon Hotel }in Clarence Parade . No one knows where the name {Pendragon }came from ,but it is connected with King Arthur and the Round Table. In the hotel there are 58 rooms. There are family rooms that can sleep five ,double rooms and single rooms.The Restaurant seats 60 people .The cooks can make up to several 100 meals a day.On the Menu they have Children's special meals like He-man steaks and Spaceburgers. They also have children's cocktails. The housekeepers look after the laundry,cleaning the rooms and polishing the furniture every day.Guests have included members of pop groups, but are usually business people during the week and families on weekend breaks.In the summer people stay for holidays.
